product_name: CoverGirlSimply Ageless Skin Eye Lift Serum
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeThe CoverGirl Simply Ageless Skin Eye Lift Serum is an eye lifting serum that reduces the appearance of undereye bags, fine lines, and wrinkles.
details: DetailsBenefitsReduces wrinkles: Eye lifting serum reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles by 57% underneath the eyeReduces puffiness: Reduces the appearance of puffiness by 53% for eyes that appear more awakeTighter skin: Skin feels tighter and wrinkles appear reduced from the undereye tightening serumInstantly youthful: Eyes look more youthful instantly and skin looks rejuvenatedWorks well with Makeup: Serum glides on smoothly and evenly for a natural, comfortable look that doesn’t crackCruelty-free: CoverGirl products are Leaping Bunny certified by Cruelty Free International, meaning they’re never tested on animalsFor all skin tonesItem 2566116How To UseApply directly to clean dry skin OR if using liquid makeup, apply after all liquid foundation and concealer has been applied.Squeeze one small pea sized drop to the ring or index finger. Remember less is more with serum!Start at the inside corner of the eye and gently sweep outwards and upwards in a long, firm and smooth motion. Feather out edges. Unlike regular moisturising eye cream, don't rub, dab or tap the product.Remain expressionless and avoid any facial movement for 2-3 minutes or until the area is completely dry.TIPS: White residue means that too much product was applied! Use very sparingly. Use alone for an instantly more refreshed and awake look. If using powder, it should be applied gently after the serum has full dried.Precautions: Use only as directed. Avoid contact with the eyes. If irritation persists, discontinue use and consult a physician.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau,Butylene Glycol, Polyurethane-35, Sodium Silicate, Glycerin, Citric Acid,Silica, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl.
how_to_use: Apply directly to clean dry skin OR if using liquid makeup, apply after all liquid foundation and concealer has been applied.Squeeze one small pea sized drop to the ring or index finger. Remember less is more with serum!Start at the inside corner of the eye and gently sweep outwards and upwards in a long, firm and smooth motion. Feather out edges. Unlike regular moisturising eye cream, don't rub, dab or tap the product.Remain expressionless and avoid any facial movement for 2-3 minutes or until the area is completely dry.TIPS: White residue means that too much product was applied! Use very sparingly. Use alone for an instantly more refreshed and awake look. If using powder, it should be applied gently after the serum has full dried.Precautions: Use only as directed. Avoid contact with the eyes. If irritation persists, discontinue use and consult a physician.

reviews.headline: Wouldn't recommend :(
reviews.comments: I bought this product to try and help with fine lines and puffiness. To be fair, I don't have anything crazy for wrinkles so I knew that change would be probably minimal. This product is honestly a little difficult to use because if you use to much it leaves this white flaky layer behind. If you use to little, sparingly like they recommend, then there is no benefit to the product. I do sometimes notice a firming like feel around my eyes but i think it depends on how much product I use. It does not work well under makeup because of the flaking and have even gotten down to one small "drop" and still had the flaking.

reviews.headline: Waste of money
reviews.comments: This product is an absolute and total waste of money considering I couldn't even use it because it wouldn't come out the tube. Threw it in the trash along with my money.Absolutely Ridiculous

reviews.headline: I wanted to love this, but…
reviews.comments: I was hopeful about this product considering I'm in the Louis Vuitton of permanent under-eye bags club. I've tried so many of these products from the high dollar (PTR/Badescu/etc) to now this more budget friendly one from Cover Girl. So I keep my expectations somewhat low as my bags are hereditary not from a lack of sleep. While this product seems to work some - I could feel a little tightening of the skin, it is a finicky product. The directions say put on after liquid foundation. Doing that created a whitish dry looking ick under my eye, so I tried to lightly rub it away, that was terrible. So I tried using it before I put on my BB foundation, it rubbed off as I applied the foundation. The only time I felt like it didn't peel or create a gross look was when I went makeup free - just my regular skincare routine and this. This seems to be the norm with all of these under-eye bag "depuffers" that seem to work - they create an ick under that peels or looks kinda gross. Another brand directs you to actually lightly rub it away after it dries but I felt like thay actually made my bags return. So I guess I'll just keep on rocking these Louis Vuitton bags for ever. I do hope others have better luck!

reviews.headline: Not a fan of the tube
reviews.comments: The tube this product comes in is absolutely awful. You have to squeeze it so hard to get it to come out that it popped the tube open on the bottom of the crimp and I lost over half to product. I will not be buying this product again due to this issue. The maker needs to rethink the container it comes in.

reviews.headline: Returned after one use
reviews.comments: Product is terrible. Turns white when dry and peels off. Cakey.

reviews.headline: Not so good
reviews.comments: If you're looking for a temporary lift, this might work for you as long as you use only a tiny amount and only tap until you no longer see the product. It doesn't seem to treat the skin and is extremely easy to use too much product, causing pilling on your skin. Even if you use a tiny amount, it causes a sticky film on the skin that can peel up later. I doubt it would work well under concealer.

reviews.headline: Peeling eye film not so appealing!
reviews.comments: The eye serum has a sticky film that is completely noticeable when it dries. The film under your eyes after application begins to lift and peel similar to a thin face mask.

reviews.headline: Simply Magic
reviews.comments: I have tried lots of different serums for under eye bags and this is absolutely magic. Works perfect with no white residue. Dries perfect and eye bags Gone!! It seriously takes 10 years off your face. I'm going to go and buy another 10 tubes of this. It won't regret buying it!!

reviews.headline: Seems to add a nice infusion of moisture
reviews.comments: Adds good moisture to delicate eye area without irritation. seems to plump a little bit especially on my droopy upper eyelids. Not a miracle in a tube but very nice for a the moisture.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again if they change the packaging.
reviews.comments: I use if differently.   I put it on first and make sure its really dry and then my makeup.  I used another product that was $250 for less than a ounce.  They all turn white if you use to. much.  By reading other reviews I read some were putting it on at night.  WHY?  Eye serums are for a temporary time to make you look good when you go to work or a night out.  It doesn't accumulate over time and make your puffiness better. I would like this product to be just a bit thicker because it is very runny.  The worst thing about this product is the tube itself.  Still really haven't figured it out.  I pull and twist the complete nozzel out which is really a pain.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: This eye lift serum works amazing.

reviews.headline: Waste of Money
reviews.comments: I was really excited to try this product and very disappointed....it's flakes after a few hours and is extremely drying, which actually enhances the look of wrinkles! It tingles upon application but I never notice any improvement in puffiness or bags. Used it for a little over a week and then threw it out.

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy this again
reviews.comments: Bought this for both me and my husband to use. And my husband always has puffy under eyes and never uses any product on his face or around his eyes so I thought even the lightest under eye serum would surely help with his puffiness under his eyes. We both used it and neither of us could tell a difference unfortunately. I was really bummed, and I thought just if he try some kind of under eye product ut help with his puffiness/circles. Which by the way aren't that bad He is 31 just looks like allergies.  But I guess I picked the wrong product because he straight up told me he noticed nothing different  and not to waste any more money on any more of these face products lol. But I also didn't notice a difference for either of us unfortunately. Just being honest. I wouldn't ever buy this again.

reviews.headline: Great product and no residue!
reviews.comments:
I ordered this online which I seldom do because it seems to be the only way to get this right now.
The directions say to use over liquid foundation and concealer which is why I wanted to try it.
I 've been using similar products ( PTR Firm X being my favorite), but they are not user friendly with makeup and tend to leave a white residue no matter how small an amount is used. This one, however, leaves no residue at all and I just applied after all my makeup was on using a flat brush and swooped in on rather than pat it on. Great results though not quite as dramatic as Firm X and price is great.

faceoff_positive.comments: i have tried a whole bunch of different eye serums. I turned 40 this year and started to notice just the very beginnings of fine lines, dark circles and bags under and around my eyes. Ive tried lots of creams, some were too strong leaving my skin burning or irritated. Others were so greasy and never really seemed to absorb. Still others felt great but never seemed to make a noticeable difference. When i was given the chance to try Cover girls product i was stoked. I have been a long time user of their products and was excited to try this. The formula is not greasy or oily, it went on smooth and didnt leave a residue. I didnt notice any tingling or burning as i have with other products. I chose to apply this product in the evening after my normal skin routine. I awoke the next morning and noticed a visible improvement with the bags under my eyes. The skin under my eye appeared tighter and brighter. As i stated i have very few fine lines and cannot remark on whether those improved because i have only been using the product about a week and i was more concernes with the bags than the fine lines. This product is comparable to other high end brands in looks and quality /results. I am also super happy to know that this is yet another cruelty free product from cover girl. I have already recommended this product to several friends and coworkers and im curious to find out how they feelm
faceoff_positive.headline: Time warp in a bottle

faceoff_negative.comments:
This is some serious stuff!
I received this serum as part of a VoxBox campaign with Covergirl. WOW! I could not believe my eyes. It works. Ever since I was a teenager I've always had puffiness and black circles under my eyes, I guess I am used to them now. This stuff disappeared all the puffiness in 2 minutes.
But, and this is a big but: you have to be very carefull and follow the instructions properly, otherwise it won't work. It is truly complicated to find the perfect amount of product to apply and the perfect b"technique" without messing everything up. It is because this level of complexity that I am giving it 3 stars. If you don't apply it correctly or if you apply too much or too little it won't work and it will even start to dry out in the middle of the day, leaving you some very bad white residues and ruining your makeup all the way.
But if you are extra careful and find the perfect amount for you to use, you'll be impressed. Having said that, let me tell you, I was that impressed that got my +70yr old mom in law to try it. It was like giving her an instant face lift. She was sold istanlty. 
So, if you're interested in having a really complicated but wonderful magic wand, run to the drugstore, this is for you! #EazyBreezyBeautiful #SimplyAgeless
faceoff_negative.headline: A magic wand!

rollup.name: Simply Ageless Skin Eye Lift Serum
